column4: EuropaCar1: The problem with those proprietary third party drivers, is that they don't always handle drops well. msttcorefonts is particularly gross about it.
ah understood, shame that it can affect my whole installation though - maybe there should be a way around individual download problems
There is. Don't use anything not free... and by free I do not mean cost.
well time to restart, hope this works out, thanks for all your help
